results.description: The mother of Ellie Soutter, the British snowboarder who took her own life on her 18th birthday, is encouraging young people to share their mental health problems.
results.title: Ellie Soutter: Mother of snowboarder on need to listen to young about mental health

results.description: Snowboarder Ellie Soutter's mother talks to the BBC about losing her daughter, finding her voice and helping others.
results.shortTitle: 'It's like having the battery taken out of me'
results.title: Ellie Soutter: British snowboarderâ€™s mother on losing her daughter

results.description: British snowboarder Katie Ormerod finishes second in the big air event on her first World Cup appearance in almost two years.
results.shortTitle: Ormerod wins silver on World Cup return
results.title: Katie Ormerod wins big air silver on World Cup return in New Zealand

results.description: British snowboarder Katie Ormerod will make her return to the World Cup circuit this week - 18 months after breaking her heel on the eve of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics.
results.shortTitle: Ormerod to make World Cup return
results.title: Katie Ormerod: British snowboarder to make World Cup return 18 months after breaking heel

results.description: Canadian snowboarder Max Parrot, who won slopestyle silver at the Pyeongchang 2018 Winter Olympics, says he has "beaten" cancer.
results.title: Max Parrot: Canadian snowboarder says he has 'beaten' Hodgkin lymphoma

label: Pyeongchang 2018 Medal Event: Snowboard - Men's Slopestyle
Snowboard - Men's Slopestyle

results.description: A foundation set up in memory of British snowboarder Ellie Soutter will sponsor 12-year-old Mia Brookes.
results.shortTitle: Ellie Soutter fund to sponsor Brookes
results.title: Ellie Soutter Foundation to sponsor young snowboarder Mia Brookes

results.description: Watch highlights from the final day British Ski & Snowboarding Championships in Switzerland as Matt McCormick & 12-year-old Mia Brooks win the snowboard slopestyle events.
results.shortTitle: 12-year-old Brookes completes clean sweep with snowboard slopestyle win
results.title: 2019 GB Freestyle Championships: Mia Brookes & Matt McCormick win in snowboard slopestyle

results.description: Watch second day highlights from the British Ski & Snowboarding Championships in Switzerland, as 12-year-old Mia Brookes is "head and shoulders" above the rest winning gold in the Big Air.
results.shortTitle: 12-year-old snowboard sensation Brookes wins Big Air gold
results.title: 2019 GB Freestyle Championships: 12 year-old Mia Brookes wins gold in the Snowboard Big Air

results.description: Olympic medallist Billy Morgan reveals he has been working as a stunt man as he takes time off from competitive snowboarding.
results.title: Billy Morgan: Winter Olympic bronze medallist becomes a stunt man

thumbnail.altText: Billy Morgan wins gold at the Brits Boardercross

results.description: Britain's Owen Pick wins a second successive World Para-Snowboard Championship silver in Finland.
results.title: World Para-Snowboard Championship: Britain's Owen Pick wins silver in Finland

results.description: Winter Olympic champion snowboarder Chloe Kim is to have surgery after breaking her ankle.
results.shortTitle: Kim to have surgery after ankle break

results.description: Banned by ski resorts for years, snowboards were first allowed on the slopes in 1983 at Stratton Mountain. Jake Burton helped create the sport
results.title: How Snowboarding became a sport

results.description: American snowboarder Jamie Anderson donates her World Championship prize money to an environmental campaign group after president of the FIS said there was no proof of climate change.
results.shortTitle: Anderson gives winnings to campaign group
results.title: Jamie Anderson donates prize money to environmental group

results.description: A year ago Katie Ormerod was on the brink of superstardom as a leading British medal prospect at the Winter Olympics - but she would break bones rather than records.
results.shortTitle: 'It's amazing to be back on the slopes'
results.title: Katie Ormerod: Back on the slopes a year after 'career-ending' injury

results.description: GB snowboarder Katie Ormerod reflects on the heel injury she suffered in the 2018 Winter Olympics in South Korea and is relieved to be back on the slopes after a tough year.
results.shortTitle: 'It could have been career-ending' Ormerod on horror injury
results.title: 'I thought it could be career-ending' Katie Ormerod on Olympic injury

results.description: Watch Great Britain's James Woods win gold in the men's slopestyle event at the Freestyle Ski and Snowboarding World Championships in Park City, Utah.

results.title: Freestyle Ski and Snowboarding Worlds: Great Britain's James Woods wins slopestyle gold

results.description: Germany's Ramona Hofmeister wins bronze despite a fall as Switzerland's Julie Zogg takes gold at the Freestyle Ski and Snowboarding World Championships.
